message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. What do you think?
I understand you need to make a profit, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $11,000. How about we meet in the middle at $10,000?
